thread.title: Iron Mountain Schedules Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Release and Conference Call
thread.title_full: Iron Mountain Schedules Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Release and Conference Call

author: admin
title: Iron Mountain Schedules Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 2:41 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Iron Mountain 
BOSTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Iron Mountain Incorporated (NYSE: IRM), the storage and information management services company, will report its third quarter 2015 financial results before market hours on Friday October 30, 2015. The Company will also host a conference call to discuss results on the same day. Call and replay information are as follows: 
Call Date: Friday October 30, 2015Call Time: 8:30 A.M. (Eastern Time) 
Call Hosts: Melissa Marsden, Senior Vice President, Investor RelationsWilliam L. Meaney, President & CEORoderick Day, Executive Vice President & CFO 
Domestic Call Dial In: 877.730.0431International Dial In: 973.453.3063 
Replay available one hour after the conclusion of the call for one week.Replay Domestic Dial In: 855.859.2056Replay International Dial In: 404.537.3406Conference ID: 45858654 
The related earnings commentary and supplemental disclosure will be available at: http://investors.ironmountain.com , under “Events and Presentations,” at approximately 6:00 A.M. ET that day. The webcast link can be accessed under “Events and Presentations” and you may register directly for the webcast at the following link: Link to be created. 
About Iron Mountain 
Iron Mountain Incorporated (NYSE: IRM) is a leading provider of storage and information management services. The company’s real estate network of more than 67 million square feet across more than 1,000 facilities in 36 countries allows it to serve customers with speed and accuracy. And its solutions for records management , data management , document management , and secure shredding help organizations to lower storage costs, comply with regulations, recover from disaster, and better use their information for business advantage. Founded in 1951, Iron Mountain stores and protects billions of information assets, including business documents, backup tapes, electronic files and medical data. Visit www.ironmountain.com for more information. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150930006858/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
